properties.verseOrder: c1 c2 v1 c1 c2 v2 c1 c2 v3 c1 c2

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Kimya hiki
kinanishangaza sana,
najiuliza. x2
Ni kiumbe
gani asiye na shukrani
humu ulimwenguni. x2

verse.name: c2
verse.lines:
Ki-imya kimya,
ki-imya kimya,
ki-imya kimya,
mimi nashangaa. x2

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Nami natoa sadaka
yangu kwa Bwana,
naye atapokea, jamani.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Japo ni kidogo
Bwana ukipokee,
mimi naleta.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Kimya ni cha nini,
tuamke wote.
Tupeleke zawadi zetu,
kwake Bwana.
